package com.movielabs.dcnc_cpl;

import java.util.*;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.nio.file.Files;
import java.nio.file.Paths;
import java.util.stream.Stream;

/**
 * List of Studio codes, obtained from http://www.digitalcinemanamingconvention.com/appendix_5.asp
 * This file was generated by tablegen.pl
 */
public class Studio {

    private static Map<String, String> studios;
    private final static String fileName = "studio.txt";

    static {
        studios = new HashMap<String, String>();
%DeAdBeEf%
    }

    public static String getLongName(String s) {
        return studios.get(s);
    }
}
